image.caption: Collection of the U.S. House of Representatives

profileText: a Representative from North Carolina; born in Buncombe County, N.C., August 1, 1995; home schooled in Hendersonville, N.C.; attended Patrick Henry College, Purcellville, Va.; business owner; elected as a Republican to the One Hundred Seventeenth Congress (January 3, 2021-January 3, 2023); unsuccessful candidate for renomination to the One Hundred Eighteenth Congress in 2022.
